mapper.select: SELECT cl.id, cl.gmt_create as gmtCreate, c.id as courseId, c.title, c.cover, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, t.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course_collect cl LEFT JOIN edu_course c ON c.id = cl.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON t.id=c.teacher_id where cl.member_id = #{memberId} order by cl.gmt_create desc
